alert.note: Alert for Claiborne; Hinds; Jefferson; Warren (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 10:50AM CDT until June 10 at 11:45AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Tensas Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Southeastern Madison Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Warren County in west central Mississippi... Claiborne County in southwestern Mississippi... Jefferson County in southwestern Mississippi... Western Hinds County in central Mississippi... * Until 1145 AM CDT. * At 1049 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Oak Ridge to near Newellton to near Wisner, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Lake Bruin, Flowers and Bovina around 1055 AM CDT. Edwards around 1100 AM CDT. St. Joseph, Lee Bayou and Newman around 1105 AM CDT. Alcorn around 1110 AM CDT. Utica, Lorman and Red Lick around 1120 AM CDT. Fayette around 1125 AM CDT. Mcnair and Stampley around 1130 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Mound, Learned and Delta. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
